intro: Vermicularia lancifolia, commonly known as the lancifoliate wormseed, is a flowering plant native to parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Chenopodiaceae and is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Vermicularia lancifolia is noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
